task.title: Enabling logging and tracing on the Proxy server
task.shortdesc: To enable tracing for the HCL Sametime 11 Proxy Server, in the folder with the Sametime proxy application, locate the "logging.properties" file located in the conf subfolder.

ol.li:
With a text editor, un-comment the two lines at the bottom of the file:
com.ibm.level=FINE
com.ibm.handlers = 2localhost.org.apache.juli.AsyncFileHandler
Restart the HCL Sametime Proxy Server to enable.

context.p: When sending data to the HCL Support team, be sure to include the entire contents of the "logs" folder.
